message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the product for $14,000. I believe it represents excellent value and will serve you well.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let me know if you're open to that.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This would be my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  This is my final offer.
